oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Sweet Corn Show at the L. B. Day Amphitheater
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Atkins, Chet; Keillor, Garrison; Roosters; Woodcuts (prints);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (green and burgundy on white) announcing The Sweet Corn Show featuring Garrison Keillor and Chet Atkins at the LB Day Amphitheater on July 21. The poster's design was adapted from a 1982 Stillhouse Rellers poster and features woodcuts of roosters and the phrase "something to crow about." The Sweet Corn Show was an 18-city United States tour featuring Garrison Keillor and Chet Atkins.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim Sherraden; Bill Tyler;
